channel.title: Git on Joan Perals — UX Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Joan Perals — UX Developer

item.title: Push current Git branch with `git push -u origin HEAD`
item.description: If you try to do just git push a Git branch that is new and not in the remote yet, you get this message, which suggests that you need some extra arguments:

item.title: Stage specific lines with `git add -p`
item.description: For example: git add -p my-file.js will start an interactive prompt that will show every hunk (block of changed lines) in the file and ask if you want to stage it or not (among other options).

item.title: It is possible to cherry-pick from another Git repository
item.description: Just that the other repository needs to be set as a remote. See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5120038/is-it-possible-to-cherry-pick-a-commit-from-another-git-repository
One of my main tasks at Content Mind was to take care of the visual layer of a Plone-based health information portal.
